title: Rescue Orin's Victim
content:
Rescue Orin's Victim Type Quest Act Act 3 Location Bhaal's Temple Reward Crimson Mischief Bloodthirst

Rescue Orin's Victim

Rescue Orin's Victim is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Rescue Orin's Victim can be acquired during Act 3 and it is a branching subquest for the main questline Get Orin's Netherstone. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3 and earn more loot and experience to become more powerful.
